title: Indian WWI Troops Praying Image MCQ 2

content.question: The experiences of soldiers such as those shown in the photograph most likely contributed to which of the following developments after 1918 ?

choices.label: Conflict between Hindus and Muslims in India
The rise of authoritarian governments between the world wars
The idea that all Muslims should unite politically under the Ottoman sultan
Growing anti-imperial opposition in European colonies such as India

content.answer: Growing anti-imperial opposition in European colonies such as India

topic.text: 8.1: Setting the Stage for the Cold War and Decolonization

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
